faq.question: What is the purpose of this platform?
faq.answer: The platform aims to provide personalized career and education guidance to students, helping them make informed decisions about their academic paths.

faq.question: How does the aptitude test work?
faq.answer: The aptitude test consists of 20 questions designed to assess your interests and strengths. Based on your responses, the platform will suggest suitable subject streams and degree options.

faq.question: Can I access information about nearby government colleges?
faq.answer: Yes, the platform provides a location-based directory of nearby government colleges, including details about the courses offered and facilities available.

faq.question: What kind of career paths can I explore?
faq.answer: After selecting a degree program, the platform will show you potential career paths, job opportunities, and options for higher studies related to that degree.

faq.question: Will I receive notifications about admission deadlines?
faq.answer: Yes, the platform includes a timeline tracker that will notify you about important admission dates, scholarship applications, and counseling schedules.

faq.question: Is the platform available offline?
faq.answer: Yes, the platform is designed to work offline, allowing you to access preloaded information and features even without an internet connection.

faq.question: How can I get personalized recommendations?
faq.answer: Upon creating a user profile, the platform will use AI-driven algorithms to provide personalized recommendations for courses, colleges, and career paths based on your interests and academic background.

faq.question: What if I have more questions?
faq.answer: You can use the chatbot feature to ask any career-related questions, and it will provide you with relevant information and guidance.
